item.title: Npgsql2 the PostgreSQL Net Data provider written 100% in C# has been released
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Npgsql2 has been RTM ðŸ™‚ Npgsql is a .Net Data Provider for Postgresql. It allows any program developed for .Net framework to access the PostgreSQL database server. It is implemented in 100% C# code. Works with Postgresql 7.x and above. Npgsql2 Supports .Net 2.0 and 3.5 and there is even added support for the EntityFramework […]
item.content:encoded:
Npgsql2 has been RTM

Npgsql is a .Net Data Provider for Postgresql. It allows any program developed for .Net framework to access the PostgreSQL database server. It is implemented in 100% C# code. Works with Postgresql 7.x and above.

Npgsql2 Supports .Net 2.0 and 3.5 and there is even added support for the EntityFramework

You can download all the goodies here: http://pgfoundry.org/frs/?group_id=1000140
